data.title: Canora climate: Weather Canora & temperature by month
data.text:
>>Weather by month // weather averages Canora

>>Climate graph // Weather by Month Canora

>>average temperature by month Canora

>>Weather Canora

The weather conditions in Canora are characterized by a chilly and moderate climate. Canora is a city with a significant rainfall. Even in the driest month there is a lot of rain. The Köppen-Geiger climate classification identifies this particular weather pattern as belonging to the category of Dfb. The temperature here averages 2.0 °C | 35.6 °F. The annual rainfall is 558 mm | 22.0 inch.

Canora is located in the northern hemisphere. The balmy days of Summer commence at the end of June and conclude in September. This period encompasses the months: June, July, August, September.

Climate graph // Weather by Month Canora

During February, the amount of precipitation is at its lowest, with only 15 mm | 0.6 inch recorded. Most of the precipitation here falls in June, averaging 100 mm | 3.9 inch.

average temperature by month Canora

The month of maximum warmth in a year is July. The average temperature during this period reaches up to 18.5 °C | 65.3 °F, making it the hottest time of the year. January is the coldest month, with temperatures averaging -15.6 °C | 3.9 °F.

Canora weather and climate for every month

Hours of sunshine in Canora

avg. hours of sun

Total hours of sun

In this location, the month that receives most sunshine is July, with a mean number of daily hours being 11.09. Across the entire duration of said calendar period there are an aggregate total of 343.9 hours' worth of sunlight.

In Canora, the month that experiences the least number of daily sunshine hours is January with an average duration of 3.4 hours per day. The total amount of sunlight recorded during this period in question stands at a sum total of 105.48.

In Canora, an average of 86.63 hours of sunshine are counted per month and around 2640.6 hours throughout the year.

Airport close to Canora

The closest Airports of Canora are: Regina International Airport (YQR) 205.10km,Saskatoon John G. Diefenbaker International Airport (YXE) 298.11km

You can reach Canora from this Cities by Plane: Toronto (YYZ), Calgary (YYC), Edmonton (YEG), Las Vegas (LAS), Vancouver (YVR), Winnipeg (YWG)
